pages.text: Magneticism is an enchantment given to gears from Magnetic Caves,adding new mechanics
pages.title: Magneticism

pages.text:
Galena Gaunlet now has the ability to be able to appropriate Teletor weapons for your own 
Grab magnetic and crystalized items from afar 
 and the ability to rip out the hearts of Magnetrons, at the cost of significant damage and cooldown dealt

Resistor Shield now has the ability to affect dropped items 
Can launch nearby seeking arrows at a pointed target if the shield is azure 
Circle nearby seeking arrows during use while scarlet
Tesla Bulbs directly shock nearby players when in range
pages.title: Shocking Therapy

pages.text: Also adds sfx from the franchise, Command And Conquer for the tesla bulbs
(CLIENT SIDE) Magnetic Items sway around if within the Magnetic Caves
pages.title: Magnetic Movement

pages.text: Rips out magnetic items out of hand with the magnetic forces if inflicted with weakness
pages.title: Magnerip

pages.text: (IF HARDCORE_MAGNERIP ENABLED) Rips out all magnetic items off of your inventory, Disabled By Default
